text: Reviewed the system requirements, looks good overall.
Please update the ICD with the latest interface changes.
Structural analysis shows stress concentrations near the mounting points.
Need to finalize the PDR package before the review meeting.
Test plan draft is missing environmental tests section.
Thermal analysis results indicate temperature spikes near electronics bay.
BOM needs review by procurement team.
DFM/DFT report draft requires feedback from manufacturing engineers.
User manual draft needs updated screenshots.
Lessons learned report outline looks solid, start adding detailed notes.
Star tracker alignment shows minor deviation, needs recalibration.
Firmware integration test encountered unexpected reset errors.
Thermal vacuum test passed all requirements except high-temperature hold time.
Sun sensor PCB assembly requires rework on connector pins.
Calibration procedure draft is missing bias correction steps.
Final acceptance test for sun sensor completed successfully.
Unexpected vibration detected in test, requires investigation.
Missing resistor in PCB layout, needs correction.
BOM discrepancies between supplier list and master list.
Software test failed during thermal cycle, re-run scheduled.
